attributes.action: Eating of Dogs in the UK to be made Unlawful
attributes.additional_details:
All domestic animals have the legal right to:

1. live in a suitable environment
2. eat a suitable diet
3. Exhibit normal behaviour patternsbe 
4. housed with, or apart from, other animals 
5. be protected from pain, suffering, injury and disease
attributes.background: We are a Country whom loves and cares for Animals. It is beyond comprehension how we allow dogs to be killed and then eaten when it is in clear breach of the Animal Welfares Act 2006 Section 9
